item.title: In January a migrant boat was rescued off the north African coast after 14 harrowing days lost at sea. Some 50 people died on the voyage. The BBC has tracked one of the traffickers responsible - documenting his activities across three continents. #Pakista
item.description: In January a migrant boat was rescued off the north African coast after 14 harrowing days lost at sea. Some 50 people died on the voyage. The BBC has tracked one of the traffickers responsible - documenting his activities across three continents. #Pakista

item.title: Fans travelled from all across the country and waited for hours to see Lady Gaga's biggest ever concert. Lady Gaga’s biggest ever concert was paid for by the city in an attempt to revitalise Rio's economy. Officials expect it could bring in $100m (£75m)

item.title: Endo About 1.5 million women in the UK are thought to have endometriosis, which causes pain and extreme tiredness as a result of tissue similar to the womb lining growing elsewhere in the body. #Endometriosis #Health #WomensHealth #Healthcare #Endo #BBCNe
